steps.title: Step 1: Inspection and Diagnosis
steps.description: We arrive ready to inspect your system and identify the problem using thermal tools and leak detection methods.

steps.title: Step 2: Clear Estimate and Plan
steps.description: Before any work begins, we explain the issue and provide a detailed quote without surprises.

steps.title: Step 3: Dedicated Work
steps.description: Our licensed team completes the repair or installation using the right tools and techniques.

steps.title: Step 4: Walkthrough and Testing
steps.description: We test the system, review the work with you, and ensure your home is left clean and working perfectly.
